crew.overview: A tough as nails private investigator (Malone) squares off with gangsters and their thugs to protect a valuable secret. Malone goes through hell to protect the information but he dishes some hell as well...
crew.title: Give 'em Hell, Malone

crew.original_title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
crew.overview: In order to avoid a jail sentence, Sean Boswell heads to Tokyo to live with his military father. In a low-rent section of the city, Shaun gets caught up in the underground world of drift racing
crew.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift

crew.original_title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
crew.overview: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. Though he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother, and sister all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.
crew.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
